headings.add_accounts: Add your accounts and manage your data in one place!
headings.link_accounts: If you link your frequently used accounts to Redrob, we will recommend customized activities.

gmail.name: Gmail
gmail.description: Centralize your email communications to manage candidate hiring process.

drive.name: Drive
drive.description: Collaborate on files with your team in real-time, ensuring seamless document management.

testgorilla.name: TestGorilla
testgorilla.description: Assess candidates with over 400 skills-based tests to make data-driven decisions.

upwork.name: Upwork
upwork.description: Take advantage of our global pool of freelancers to flexibly complete your projects.

remote.name: Remote
remote.description: We provide an integrated HR, payroll, and compliance management platform for managing distributed global teams.

deel.name: Deel
deel.description: Easily manage team payroll across multiple countries to support smooth global operations.

linkedin.name: LinkedIn
linkedin.description: Connect with top talent through LinkedIn network and leverage advanced recruiting tools.

messages.coming_soon_warning: This feature is only available in business plan. Please upgrade your plan.

alt.platform_image: List of platform integrated with Redrob platform
